data.text: Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye.
un mutiyo e od Jehova Nyasaye,
Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye, nimar Jehova Nyasaye ber;
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye oseyiero Jakobo, mondo obed gire owuon;
Angʼeyo ni Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ,
Jehova Nyasaye timo gimoro amora mohero,
Omiyo boche wuok koa e tungʼ piny koni gi koni,
Ne ogoyo nyithindo makayo mag Misri,
Ne ooro ranyisi gi honni mage e dieru, yaye Misri,
Ne ogoyo pinje mangʼeny piny,
kaka Sihon ruodh jo-Amor,
kendo nomiyogi piny jogo kaka girkeni,
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nyingi osiko nyaka chiengʼ,
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye biro chwako joge,
Nyiseche mopa mag ogendini gin fedha gi dhahabu,
Gin gi dhogi, to kata kamano, ok ginyal wuoyo,
Gin gi it, to ok ginyal winjo wach,
Joma losogi nobed machal kodgi,
Un jo-Israel, pakuru Jehova Nyasaye;
un dhood joka Lawi, pakuru Jehova Nyasaye;
Jehova Nyasaye mondo opaki gie Sayun,
